appName: Jolly Match: First MR Match-3 Puzzles
displayName: Jolly Match: First MR Match-3 Puzzles
display_name: Jolly Match: First MR Match-3 Puzzles
display_long_description:
**Limited-time Winter event is live now in Jolly Match: First MR Match-3 Puzzles - don’t miss it! This season, go from cozy Match-3 moments to a festive challenge filled with snow, nimble elves, snowballs, a giant slingshot, and a mighty boss trying to ruin Sweetmas. Only you can stop him!**

**And while the Winter event brings extra fun, the core of Jolly Match 3 MR is just as engaging. Play Match-3 like never before in this family-friendly puzzle game, winner of the Best in AR/MR Experiences award at the QLD XR Festival 2025.**

[media]

Key Features:

**- Fully Interactive Gameplay**

Adjust the gameboard to fit your space: zoom it in and out and place it wherever works best for you. Enjoy smooth hand tracking navigation (controllers supported).

**- Unique Boosters and Epic Combos**

Use powerful boosters like Hammer, Unicorn, or Space Kitty, and create epic combos to pass match-3 puzzles with the best results!

[media]

**- Build Islands with Iconic Landmarks**

Unlock and rebuild miniature islands inspired by the real famous locations — from New York, San Francisco, and Texas to Venice and Paris. Gain stars to get objects and decorate every area. Zoom in and interact with them as you like.

[media]

**- Exciting and Engaging Levels**

Each level with a unique design brings a new experience, making every playthrough captivating and fun. 

**- Daily Quests and Rewards**

Play every day and claim rewards! Complete exciting quests to speed up your progress, unlock new boosters, and access fresh content.

[media]
